name: Life ain't sheep
description:
Life ain't sheep

CONTROLS:

(Disclaimer: the game was made with a controller in mind)

Move: Left joystick/WASD

Look around: Right joystick

Life ain't sheep is a top-down action-adventure, focused on herding the free-roaming herbivores, scattered around town.

Collect as many sheep as possible before getting subdued by the military's special forces, trained to bring you down with the most dangerous missiles from their arsenal.

Good luck, fellow shepherd!
